parameters.label: organization-defined time until end of session

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Display an explicit message to users indicating that the session will end in {{ ac-12.3_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: To increase usability, notify users of pending session termination and prompt users to continue the session. The pending session termination time period is based on the parameters defined in the AC-12 base control.
